column1: **{author}** whispers an ancient meme to **{target}**… Internet lag intensifies!
**{author}** throws a cosmic cupcake at **{target}**! Critical sugar rush!
**{author}** challenges **{target}** to a speed‑typing duel. CAPS LOCK ENGAGED!
**{author}** gifts **{target}** a bucket of bees. Buzz… buzz… BUZZ!
**{author}** rolls a nat 20 charisma check on **{target}**. Friendship++
**{author}** flexes their RGB keyboard at **{target}**. ✨ Gamer aura intensifies!
**{author}** sends **{target}** a Rick‑roll— but in Morse code.
**{author}** drops a single corn chip. **{target}** is compelled to monch.
